amendment.description: To facilitate the commemoration of the success of the United States Armed Forces in Operation Enduring Freedom and Operation Iraqi Freedom.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2566 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2566 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12789-12790) To facilitate the commemoration of the success of the United States Armed Forces in Operation Enduring Freedom and Operation Iraqi Freedom.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2566 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2566 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McConnell.
